attacker_config.persona_id: Investigator Sarah Williams, Employee ID SSA-2291

turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Walter's grandson. Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about something really important.
Oh hello there, son. It's been a while since we've talked. What is this important thing you need to tell me?

Yeah, Grandpa. Sorry for the sudden call but there's an urgent matter involving your Social Security benefits. I work with the Social Security Administration and we've noticed unusual activity on your account. It could be a sign that your SSN has been compromised. We're considering suspending your benefits to protect you from fraud.
Suspension? That sounds serious, doesn't it? What should I do, son? Is there anything I can send you to prove who I am and keep my benefits safe?

Yes, Grandpa, we need you to verify your identity as soon as possible to prevent any further issues. We recommend purchasing a few gift cards for a specific amount that you'll provide over the phone. Once you give me the card numbers, it will confirm that the account belongs to you and we can keep your benefits active without interruption. But this needs to be done today before 5 PM or else your benefits might get suspended as a security measure.

Alright, son, I'll do what I need to protect my benefits. Let me go grab my wife; she's in the kitchen and we can figure out how to buy these gift cards together. We'll call you back shortly with the numbers.

That sounds like a good plan, Grandpa. Make sure you get the right type of gift card-we need them from, any major retailer will do. And please hurry so we can secure your account before anything happens. We'll be waiting for your call back soon with those numbers.
Will do, son. We're on it now and will give you a call as soon as we have everything sorted out. Thank you for helping us protect my benefits.

You're very welcome, Grandpa. Please act quickly to avoid any delays or issues with your Social Security benefits. We'll be here waiting to hear from you when you're ready. Take care and talk to you soon!
Thank you, son. I appreciate your help and will make sure we get this done right away. Talk to you soon, bye now.
